text: wkma 'arak rabik hadhih alruwya fkdhlk ystfyk wayuealimuk tafsir ma yarah alnaas fi mnamhm min alruwaa mimaa twwl 'iilayh waqeana, wayutimu niematah ealayk waealaa al yaequb balnbwt walrsalt, kama 'atamaha min qibal ealaa 'abawayk 'iibrahim wa'iishaq balnbwt walrsal. 'iina rabak ealim biman ystfyh min ebadh, hakim fi tadbir 'umur khlqh
